description: Variation of Condition 2 (Plans) of planning permission  19/01848/FUL (Erection of a Single Storey Rear Extension and Front Loft conversion) to allow minimum 500mm offset distance for dormer windows.
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The decision to which this permission relates shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of the granting of application reference 19/01848/HOU (17/09/2019).Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The accommodation hereby permitted shall be occupied solely for purposes ancillary to the occupation of the application property and shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.Reason: The establishment of an additional independent unit of accommodation would give rise to an over-intensive use of the site and lead to an unsatisfactory relationship between independent dwellings.

The details submitted for Condition  9 (Boundary Treatment), 10 (Construction Management Plan), 11 (Levels), 13 (Landscaping), 18 (Climate Change Mitigation) and 19 (Sustainable Drainage) of planning permission 20/00625/FUL, would be sufficient enough to allow discharge of these conditions.
The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the obligation, as noted above, is fully discharged.

The submitted block plan does not show the position of the proposed garage. Please provide a Proposed Block Plan drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site. The Block Plan must show the direction of North and should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.

The proposed plan shows kitchen in the main house, whereas same part of the main house is shown as garage in the existing plan. Please clarify the  the proposal includes main house garage conversion. Please amend the drawings accordingly.
